title: Introduction to C
description:
Welcome to C Programming!

C is a powerful general-purpose programming language. It is fast, portable, and available on all platforms.

Let's start with the classic 'Hello, World!' program.

title: Variables and Types
description:
Variables

In C, you need to declare variables before using them. Common types include int, float, char.

Task:

Create an integer variable named age, assign it the value 25, and print it.

title: Loops
description:
Loops

Loops allow you to execute a block of code multiple times. A for loop is commonly used when you know how many times to iterate.

Task:

Write a loop that prints numbers from 1 to 5.

title: Functions
description:
Functions

Functions help organize code into reusable blocks.
